item.title: About
item.description: Graphics engineer and game developer. Currently working at EA - Maxis as a software engineer. Before, I worked at The Forge, GritWorld and Gram Games (Zynga). See my CV here. Here are a bunch of my personal projects: Real-time Volumetric Clouds Inspired by Horizon Zero Dawn, I’ve implemented volumetric clouds based on Guerilla’s talk. I’ve used the engine I developed for my thesis to implement this project. After the theis, I implemented a frame/render graph to quickly work on real-time effects like this one.
